Stone Hoe.description: Slightly better than the wooden hoe, but still has room for improvement. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-50, 75*

Iron Hoe.description: A fast, reliable farming tool. You feel energised when wielding it. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-25, 75*

Diamond Hoe.description: The shimmering blue blade increases your potato farming abilities. Farming range is changed from *-50, 50* to *-25, 100*

Lottery Potato.description: `p!buy 1 lottery potato` When used, offers a 5% chance of earning 42069 :potato:. Can also be collected through digging.

Potato trophy.description: `p!buy 1 potato trophy` Flex your 5mil potatoes with this trophy. Only the rich can afford this.

Golden Potato.description: `p!buy 1 golden potato` The holy golden potato. Can also be collected through digging.

Invisible Potato.description: `p!buy 1 invisible potato` Basically Lay's chips. Can also be collected through digging.

Potato Chip.description: `p!buy 1 potato chip` A single potato chip. Can also be collected through digging.

Rotten Potato.description: `p!buy 1 dirty potato` Why would you buy this. Can also be collected through digging.
